Detector.Details: This detector looks for a flow of tainted data from methods marked as @TaintedResult to the methods, which parameters are marked as @SensitiveParameters. Because it performs dataflow analysis, it is fairly slow.
This detector builds a flow of sensitive annotations backwardly and sets constraints on parameter values.

BugPattern.Details: Tainted data reaches sensitive sink. This kind of defect may indicate some kind of vulnerability.
